trans-unit.source: The property '{0}' with [DataMember] does not have a getter which is required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: The property '{0}' with [DataMember] does not have a getter which is required for serialization.

trans-unit.source: The property '{0}' with [DataMember] does not have an accessible getter which is required for serialization. A public/internal/internal protected getter is expected.
trans-unit.target: The property '{0}' with [DataMember] does not have an accessible getter which is required for serialization. A public/internal/internal protected getter is expected.

trans-unit.source: All serializers need a getter on a property to be able to get the content of the property. This is required for all serializers in Stride.
trans-unit.target: All serializers need a getter on a property to be able to get the content of the property. This is required for all serializers in Stride.

trans-unit.source: Non existent getters will result in error message 1.
trans-unit.target: Non existent getters will result in error message 1.

trans-unit.source: Non visible getters will result in error message 2.
trans-unit.target: Non visible getters will result in error message 2.

trans-unit.source: The following example generates STRDIAG004 on each property:
trans-unit.target: The following example generates STRDIAG004 on each property:

trans-unit.source: !WARNING There is an edge case with internal/internal protected, it will count as non visible when the @Stride.Core.DataMemberAttribute isn't applied. But when the attribute is applied then the getter counts as visible and therefore is correct.
trans-unit.target: !WARNING There is an edge case with internal/internal protected, it will count as non visible when the @Stride.Core.DataMemberAttribute isn't applied. But when the attribute is applied then the getter counts as visible and therefore is correct.

trans-unit.source: To resolve the warning 1, add a getter to the property with a public/internal/internal protected accessibility or remove the @Stride.Core.DataMemberAttribute .
trans-unit.target: To resolve the warning 1, add a getter to the property with a public/internal/internal protected accessibility or remove the @Stride.Core.DataMemberAttribute .

trans-unit.source: To resolve the warning 2, increase the accessibility of the property getter to public/internal/internal protected accessibility or remove the @Stride.Core.DataMemberAttribute .
trans-unit.target: To resolve the warning 2, increase the accessibility of the property getter to public/internal/internal protected accessibility or remove the @Stride.Core.DataMemberAttribute .
